title: How to Make a Professional Camera Slider (100% DIY!)
description:
In this video we're going to make a super-smooth camera slider so that we can pull off some awesome cinematic camera moves! Built out of standard copper piping, it is cheap and easy to recreate the world over. And it looks super cool! Video Blocks sign-up link: http://vblocks.co/x/diyperks1215
